#summary The screen.fontSmoothingEnabled property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property,from-microsoft

== Values ==

The `screen.fontSmoothingEnabled` property returns a boolean.

  * `true` means that ClearType is enabled
  * `false` means that ClearType is disabled

This property is read-only.
